config.mixtape.yacl.missing: Yet Another Config Lib is not installed.
config.mixtape.yacl.missing.message: YACL 3 is required to use this mod, would you like to install YACL 3?
config.mixtape.config.title: Mixtape
config.mixtape.main.enabled.description: Toggles whether the mod is enabled or not.
config.mixtape.main.varyPitch.descriptio: Toggles whether songs should be played at slightly different pitches. Adds variation and makes the songs less repetitive.
config.mixtape.main.minNoteChange.descri: The lowest pitch a song can be played at. Only used if Vary Pitch is enabled.
config.mixtape.main.maxNoteChange.descri: The highest pitch a song can be played at. Only used if Vary Pitch is enabled.
Toggles whether there should be a delay between songs. If enabled, delays set in specific categories will be ignored.
config.mixtape.main.musicType.descriptio: The type of music that should be played. If set to Automatic, the music will be chosen based on the current biome.
config.mixtape.main.playKeybindReplacesC: Toggles whether the play keybind should replace the current song or not. If disabled, the play keybind will only play a song if there is no song currently playing.
config.mixtape.main.skipKeybindStartsNex: Toggles whether the skip keybind should start the next song or not. If disabled, the skip will not start another song if they is a delay between songs.
config.mixtape.main.pauseMusicWhenGamePa: Pause Music When Game Is Paused
Toggles whether the music should be paused when the game is paused.
config.mixtape.main.stopMusicWhenSwitchi: Toggles whether the music should be stopped when switching dimensions.
config.mixtape.main.stopMusicWhenLeftGam: Toggles whether the music should be stopped when leaving the game.
config.mixtape.main.enableDebugInfo.desc: Toggles whether mixtape debug info should be added to the f3 screen.
config.mixtape.musicToast.enabled.descri: Toggles whether music toasts should be displayed.
config.mixtape.musicToast.showArtistName: Toggles whether the artist name should be displayed on the music toast.
Toggles whether the album name should be displayed on the music toast.
config.mixtape.musicToast.showAlbumCover: Toggles whether the album cover should be displayed on the music toast.
config.mixtape.musicToast.useDiscItemAsA: Use Disc Item As Album Cover
Toggles whether the disc item should be used as the album cover. (only works for disc songs)
config.mixtape.musicToast.hideJukeboxHot: Hide Jukebox Now Playing Hotbar Message
Toggles whether the jukebox now playing hotbar message should be hidden.
config.mixtape.musicToast.useHotbarInste: Use The Hotbar To Display Now Playing Instead Of Toasts
Toggles whether the hotbar should be used to display now playing instead of toasts.
config.mixtape.musicToast.toastMakesSoun: Toggles whether the toast should make a sound when it is displayed.
config.mixtape.musicToast.toastDisplayTi: The time in ticks that the toast should be displayed for.
config.mixtape.musicToast.remainForFullS: Toggles whether the toast should remain until the song finishes or not.
config.mixtape.menu.enabled.description: Toggle whether music plays in the menu.
config.mixtape.menu.minSongDelay.descrip: The minimum delay (in ticks) before the next song can play.
config.mixtape.menu.maxSongDelay.descrip: The maximum Delay (in ticks) before the next song can play.
config.mixtape.creative.enabled.descript: Toggle whether music plays in creative mode.
config.mixtape.creative.minSongDelay.des: The minimum delay (in ticks) before the next song can play.
config.mixtape.creative.maxSongDelay.des: The maximum Delay (in ticks) before the next song can play.
config.mixtape.game.enabled.description: Toggle whether music plays in survival mode.
config.mixtape.game.minSongDelay.descrip: The minimum delay (in ticks) before the next song can play.
config.mixtape.game.maxSongDelay.descrip: The maximum Delay (in ticks) before the next song can play.
config.mixtape.game.creativeMusicPlaysIn: Toggle whether music from creative mode plays in survival mode.
config.mixtape.underwater.minSongDelay.d: The minimum delay (in ticks) before the next song can play.
config.mixtape.underwater.maxSongDelay.d: The maximum Delay (in ticks) before the next song can play.
config.mixtape.end.enabled.description: Toggle whether music plays in the end.
config.mixtape.end.minSongDelay.descript: The minimum delay (in ticks) before the next song can play.
config.mixtape.end.maxSongDelay.descript: The maximum Delay (in ticks) before the next song can play.
config.mixtape.nether.enabled.descriptio: Toggle whether music plays in the nether.
config.mixtape.nether.minSongDelay.descr: The minimum delay (in ticks) before the next song can play.
config.mixtape.nether.maxSongDelay.descr: The maximum Delay (in ticks) before the next song can play.
config.mixtape.credits.enabled.descripti: Toggle whether music plays during the credits.
config.mixtape.jukebox.mono.description: Toggles whether music disc songs should be played in mono. (The same volume in both ears)
config.mixtape.jukebox.distance.descript: The distance you can hear the music from. (Only applies when you have mono enabled)
Toggles whether the 11 disc should be replaced with the song eleven by c418.
config.mixtape.jukebox.dogReplacesCat.de: Toggles whether the cat disc should be replaced with the song dog by c418.
config.mixtape.jukebox.droopyLikesYourFa: Droopy Likes Your Face replaces ward
Toggles whether the ward disc should be replaced with the song Droopy Likes Your Face by c418.
config.mixtape.jukebox.volume.descriptio: The volume of the music discs.
config.mixtape.jukebox.turnDownMusic: Turn down the regular music while discs play
config.mixtape.jukebox.turnDownMusic.des: Toggles whether the regular music should be turned off while music discs are playing.
